name: Backrooms + POOLROOMS
description:
Model makes not that noisy of a result, but i used a combo of pos+neg prompts to make it look more like VHS tape or smth.
Works surprisingly well (Updated to 1.5 from 1.4 model for better results, also added poolrooms!! Now can make LVL 0 and POOLROOMS)

This model is custom 1.5 model trained on screenshots from backrooms games and also arts and 3d renders on different sites. 512x512 is training res.
Made it for personal use a while ago and desided to uplioad it, maybe someone else wants to have fun.
Have fun and idk share with friends or smth :p)
Not much else to add, hope you ll enjoy!)
///Some examples are not that good cuz i rushed to publish it so prompts arent that complicated too
